channel.title: Savage Realms (Something For Everyone)
channel.description:
Savage Realms is a server that has literally something for everyone, how so you may ask well. Savage Realms actually has 4 servers in total. Pretty cool right, here are the different servers. Main: More of a build world, but still has PVP, quests, and other fun things. RPG: Is more of a Questing world with more quests then main, but still has PVP. Raid: This is a fully PVP server with no quests. And last but not least Savage Games: Savage games is a hunger games like server but Savage realms style. Are you interested in the server. :confused: If you still have questions or want to know more about it go to the link below.
http://www.savagerealms.net/
If you aren't quite sure still go to the link below it is videos of Savage Realms Main.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pp9qMUnJoYc
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PGjqBnOnVcY
I really hope you come see this server because when I first started it was the greatest server I have ever played on (and I have played on a lot) because it had everything I loved in a server and more, so please come check this server out it will be worth your time I promise. :D
